testcase.name: #attachListeners should attach event listeners which call your turn function when someone clicks on a square
#doTurn should increment turn and call on `checkWinner()`, `updateState()`
#player should return the mark of the current player when player is X
#player should return the mark of the current player when player is O
#updateState adds the return value of `player()` to the clicked `td` on the board
#message adds the string it's passed to the div with an id of message
#checkWinner returns false if there is no winning combo on the board
#checkWinner calls on 'message' and passes it the string 'Player X Won!' when player X wins vertically
#checkWinner calls on 'message' and passes it the string 'Player X Won!' when player X wins diagonally
when there is a tie calls on 'message' and passes it the string 'Tie game' when there is a tie
resetting the board resets the board and sets turn to zero when there is a winner
resetting the board resets the board and sets turn to zero when there is a tie
resetting the board allows client to play multiple game
